document_data.mainbody:
Oliver Synge was a merchant who operated on the Sword Coast during the late 14 century DR. Synge was of the Calishite ethnicity.
On Eleasis 26 of the ,While this year is not explicitly stated, it is inferred from the date given in the "Dark Journal" and the "Moonhaven Logbook". Presumably, Ilyn Toth wrote each document over the course of the same time. Synge spent one day in the small village of Moonhaven. The merchant returned later on Nightal 14, but merely passed through the town. Synges activities were observed by the paranoid, exiled Red Wizard Ilyn Toth.
